Source.Name: powerstat
Source.Summary: Powerstat measures the power consumption of a machine using the battery stats or the Intel RAPL interface.
Source.Description: Powerstat measures the power consumption of a laptop using the ACPI battery information. The output is like vmstat but also shows power consumption statistics. At the end of a run, powerstat will calculate the average, standard deviation and min/max of the gathered data.
